Row.Text: Alas, we have another grand nation in our midst! I am Obafemi Awolowo, leader of the Nigeria - A country built upon the ideals of freedom and prosperity befitting the heritage of the Hausa empires that came before me.

Our nation lies in ruins, and as the Leader of the Yorubas it seems that I have failed. I fear not, for I know that Nigeria's strength was fueled by diversity - something of which your empire will now have to embody wholeheartedly if you'd want to survive in this new world.
